name: treatment
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's treatment at a specific point in the clinical record. To submit multiple treatments for a single donor, please submit treatment rows in the treatment file for this donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_primary_diagnosis_id
fields.description: Indicate the primary diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this treatment was related to.

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.description: Indicate the type of treatment regimen that the donor completed.

meta.notes:
Depending on the treatment_type(s) selected, additional treatment details may be required to be submitted. For example, if treatment_type includes 'Chemotherapy', the supplemental Chemotherapy treatment type file is required.
To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

fields.name: is_primary_treatment
fields.description: Indicate if the treatment was the primary treatment following the initial diagnosis.

fields.name: line_of_treatment
fields.description: Indicate the line of treatment if it is not the primary treatment.

fields.name: treatment_start_interval
fields.description: The interval between the primary diagnosis and initiation of treatment, in days.

meta.notes: The associated primary diagnosis is used as the reference point for this interval. To calculate this, find the number of days since the date of primary diagnosis.

fields.name: treatment_duration
fields.description: The duration of treatment regimen, in days.

fields.name: days_per_cycle
fields.description: Indicate the number of days in a treatment cycle.

fields.name: number_of_cycles
fields.description: Indicate the number of treatment cycles.

fields.name: treatment_intent
fields.description: Indicate the intended disease outcome for which the treatment is given. (Reference: NCIt C124307)

fields.name: treatment_setting
fields.description: Indicate the treatment setting, which describes the treatment's purpose in relation to the primary treatment. (Reference: NCIt C124308)

fields.name: response_to_treatment_criteria_method
fields.description: Indicate the criteria used to assess the donor's overall response to the applied treatment regimen.

codeList: ELN Dohner AML Oncology Response Criteria

fields.name: response_to_treatment
fields.description: The donor's response to the applied treatment regimen. (Source: RECIST)

codeList: Complete remission with incomplete hematologic recovery (CRi)
Complete remission without measurable residual disease (CR MRD-)

fields.name: outcome_of_treatment
fields.description: Indicate the donor's outcome of the prescribed treatment.

codeList: Treatment incomplete due to technical or organizational problems
Treatment stopped due to lack of efficacy (disease progression)
Treatment stopped due to acute toxicity

fields.name: toxicity_type
fields.description: If the treatment was terminated early due to acute toxicity, indicate whether it was due to hematological toxicity or non-hematological toxicity.

fields.name: hematological_toxicity
fields.description: Indicate the hematological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

fields.name: non-hematological_toxicity
fields.description: Indicate the non-hematological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

fields.name: adverse_events
fields.description: Report any treatment related adverse events. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

fields.name: clinical_trials_database
fields.description: If the donor is a participant in a clinical trial, indicate the clinical trial database where the clinical trial is registered.

meta.notes: If the clinical trials database you use is not included in the controlled terminology, please contact us at https://platform.icgc-argo.org/contact to request it be added.

fields.name: clinical_trial_number
fields.description: Based on the clinical_trial_database, indicate the unique NCT or EudraCT clinical trial identifier of which the donor is a participant.
